name: CNN
text:
A new hiring initiative at Adidas is aiming to increase the representation of people of color in its North American workforce.

The company has announced that it plans to fill a minimum of 30% of new positions with black or Latinx people. https://t.co/84otAGE3V9

name: CNN
text: Coronavirus is ‚Äúmy worst nightmare,‚Äù worse in ways than Ebola or HIV, said Dr. Anthony Fauci, director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases https://t.co/z6k1HVprTP

name: CNN
text: George Floyd was an "ordinary brother" from Houston's housing projects who "nobody thought much about," which makes his central role in a generational movement that much more powerful, the Rev. Al Sharpton said at his funeral https://t.co/M6gkUi1jsJ

name: CNN
text:
"Ebola was scary, but Ebola would never be easily transmitted," Dr. Anthony Fauci said.

"HIV, as important as it is, was drawn out and over an extended period of time," he added. https://t.co/gIqrupm8MV

name: CNN
text: The DC Council has passed an emergency bill to reform policing, including measures that ban the use of tear gas and rubber bullets, and prohibit the hiring of officers who were fired from another police department https://t.co/Wmjg4c9BK6

name: CNN
text: New York legislators are on track to pass a package of bills providing for comprehensive police reform, and Gov. Andrew Cuomo says he intends to sign them all quickly https://t.co/noJ2xewJZC

name: CNN
text: Deshaun Watson, DeAndre Hopkins and thousands others have called on Clemson University to rename some of its facilities, notably the Honors College program, that bear the name of slaveholder John C. Calhoun https://t.co/4kFIWYCWtb

name: CNN
text:
After more than 30 years patrolling the airwaves, "Cops" has been canceled.

The police show, which originated on Fox in 1989, had been pulled days before its scheduled season premiere, an action that came amid questions and protests about policing. https://t.co/I8Y1yfwpFK

name: CNN
text: Embattled CrossFit CEO Greg Glassman is resigning after he sparked outrage over his response to nationwide protests against racial injustice and police brutality https://t.co/ZqL3F5xgk6

name: CNN
text: The Trump administration is preparing to roll out another set of restrictions on legal immigration, citing the impact of the coronavirus pandemic, even as it argues for the reopening of the US economy, according to sources familiar with the deliberations https://t.co/wkLioz2Ou5

name: CNN
text: Once the party's standard-bearer and presidential nominee, Mitt Romney has found himself in a moment where he's a man on an island, often one of the GOP's only members criticizing Pres. Trump publicly for his tone, tweets and inability to unite the country https://t.co/1wF1nIfqOz

name: CNN
text: RT @OutFrontCNN: ‚ÄúAt this point it‚Äôs another institutional cover-up,‚Äù says William Wagstaff, attorney for the Maurice Gordon family, about the New Jersey attorney general‚Äôs handling of recordings of the fatal officer-involved shooting. https://t.co/YqHZtAwchG https://t.co/ZQ2LEtNzft

name: CNN
text: As the President eyes a return to the campaign trail, chomping at the bit to resume the rallies that defined his first bid for office and much of the last three years, the Trump army is also mobilizing for November https://t.co/SqtKLXmycg

name: CNN
text: "He loved his community," says Tiffany Cofield about her friend, George Floyd. "Everyone knew that every time he would be around you felt like everything was okay, because his presence made a difference." https://t.co/twVOxpk6Oz https://t.co/z1Qqcnyl3q

name: CNN
text:
Deshaun Watson, DeAndre Hopkins and thousands of others have called on Clemson University to rename some of its facilities that bear the name of slaveholder John C. Calhoun.

Clemson University was built on former US Vice President Calhoun's plantation.  https://t.co/GWq75GFKBd

name: CNN
text: ‚ÄúWe would have done even more if we had not got overtaken by slogans. ‚ÄòBurn baby burn,‚Äô took off in this country. T‚Ä¶ https://t.co/kBIbFpRSFF

name: CNN
text: Time-traveling duo Bill S. Preston, "Esquire" and "Ted" Theodore Logan are back https://t.co/gq7mi3XsuA

name: CNN
text: At least two employees of Tesla's main factory in Fremont, California, have tested positive for Covid-19 since it resumed operations, The Washington Post reports https://t.co/c3WEOZ10XJ

name: CNN
text: Attorney General William Barr jabbed back at DC Mayor Muriel Bowser in a letter, saying federal law enforcement and National Guard troops were necessary in the city because the unrest had hit unprecedented and dangerous levels in the nation's capital https://t.co/Jz8aCx4JyQ

name: CNN
text: Many people still don't know Queen frontman Freddie Mercury was born in Zanzibar. This museum hopes to put the African island on the rock history map. https://t.co/bZ8MnLaqlr

name: CNN
text: In a week where Bubba Wallace wore an "I Can't Breathe" T-shirt before an event and said racetracks shouldn't allow Confederate flags, the NASCAR driver will make another bold move Wednesday by racing a car with a Black Lives Matter paint scheme https://t.co/cAsbJjmYZq

name: CNN
text: Republican senators ‚Äî confronted by marches in cities and small towns across America ‚Äî are growing more vocal that the party must act on policing reform, a stark contrast to just a week ago when many members dismissed the idea of the Senate acting at all https://t.co/BNaqft7Mfq
